verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Jeremias \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Write|strong="H3789"\w* thee \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Juda, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Juda:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w terror|strong="H6343"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w*? \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w loins|strong="H2504"\w*, \w like|strong="H2015"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* woman \w in|strong="H5921"\w* labour, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* yellow?

\w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* tribulation \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w bands|strong="H4147"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* rule \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou \w not|strong="H0369"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* abound \w with|strong="H3068"\w* all \w good|strong="H2005"\w* \w things|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* whom \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w utterly|strong="H0389"\w* consume \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* thee: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w utterly|strong="H0389"\w* consume thee: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w chastise|strong="H3256"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* seem \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thyself \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Thy bruise \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w incurable|strong="H0605"\w*, thy \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* very grievous.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* thy \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* bind it up: thou hast \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w healing|strong="H7499"\w* medicines.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w wounded|strong="H5221"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w* chastisement: \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w reason|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w are|strong="H5771"\w* hardened.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* criest thou \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thy affliction? thy \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w incurable|strong="H0605"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thy hardened \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w I|strong="H0428"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thee shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy enemies shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* carried \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* waste thee shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* wasted, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w prey|strong="H0957"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* close \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thy scar, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* thee \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Sion, \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w outcast|strong="H5080"\w*: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* pavilions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w pity|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4908"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* temple \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* found \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w order|strong="H0559"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w play|strong="H7832"\w*: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3513"\w* \w few|strong="H4591"\w*: \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* lessened.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beginning, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* permanent \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w afflict|strong="H3905"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w leader|strong="H0117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* themselves: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* prince \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* setteth \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* whirlwind \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* violent \w storm|strong="H5591"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rest \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* indignation, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* executed \w and|strong="H6965"\w* performed \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w thought|strong="H3820"\w* \w o|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* these \w things|strong="H3808"\w*.
